8. Take Advantage of Discounts Offered to Special Groups利用对特殊人群的价格优惠

Disney offers a wide variety of discounts, including for military service members, college students, credit unions, corporate and government groups, teachers, and youth groups. If you think you might qualify for a special discount or group rate, call the Disneyland Resort to book tickets. Discounts are offered inside the park.迪士尼乐园对很多人群有价格优惠政策，比如现役军人、大学生、 信用社成员、公司或政府团体、教师和青年团队。如果你觉得自己属于享受价格优惠的特殊个人或团体，你可以打电话去订票。在园区内也可以办理折扣价。

9. Arrange Your Trip Around the Off-Season Times将你的行期定在旅游淡季

Lots of things, from airfare to souvenirs, can get more expensive during Disneyland's busier times of the year. To make the most of your money, plan your trip during the park's off-season. The months of September through March -- excluding December -- are not as crowded at the parks, and even hotels can be less expensive during these months.在一年之中迪士尼乐园的游园旺季，机票、纪念品等许多东西的价格会上涨。为了能最合理的消费，可以将行期定在游园的淡季。从9月到来年3月（包括12月），园内的游客都比较少，在这几个月份里就连周边的旅馆房价都会较为便宜。

10. Look Out for Special Offers and Coupons关注特价优惠和代金券

Disneyland will usually offer special discounts during its off-season to promote business. These tickets can have substantial discounts, and although they are sold during the off-season, are usually good for one calendar year. 在游园淡季里，迪士尼乐园经常推出特价优惠活动以刺激需求。这时票价往往相当优惠，而且，虽然是在游园淡季出售的，却是全年有效的哟。

11. Get a Disney Visa Card申请一张迪士尼信用卡

Disney offers Visa credit cards that come with extra perks and benefits. You earn rewards on everything you buy. These rewards can be used on everything Disney, including DVDs, movie tickets, toys, costumes and Disneyland travel. 迪士尼乐园提供的信用卡带有各种特权和优惠。任何消费都能获得奖励。购买任何迪士尼品牌的东西都能获得奖励，包括迪士尼DVD、电影票、玩具、化妆品和游园票等等。

12. Take Your Kids Before Age 3在孩子3岁前带他们去

Kids 3 years old and under get into the Disney theme parks completely free. If you can plan your trip while your kids are still under 3, you can save a large sum of money. Some parents worry about spending a lot of money on a trip their children will not remember, but kids as young as 1 year old will love their Disney experience even if they might not remember it.3岁以下的幼儿去迪士尼乐园游玩是完全免费的。如果你在孩子还没满3岁的时候就启程带他们去玩，你会省下一大笔钱。有些家长担心孩子太小，花了一大笔钱，孩子却没有留下记忆。可是，即使是1岁的小宝宝也会享受在迪士尼乐园游玩的经历，即使他们不会记住这次游园经历。

13. Invest in an Annual Disneyland Passport攒钱买张迪士尼全年入场券

All annual passports allow park-hopper access and offer discounts on merchandise. Keep your pass on you everywhere you go near Disneyland and ask if cardholders get discounts.全年入场券让你可以同时在两个主题乐园里游玩，还提供购物优惠。在迪士尼乐园周边地区记得随身携带这张入场券，买东西的时候问问持这种入场券是否可以享受优惠。

14. Check Into Hotel Packages or Book Through an Agency享受旅店的游园套餐或者通过旅行社订票

It is worthwhile to look into package deals cause many hotels offer deals that include things like breakfast, a shuttle pass, free internet and other discounts. It is also possible to get lower rates through a travel agency. 许多旅店提供迪士尼游园套餐，包括早餐、班车车票、免费网络和各种消费折扣，这种旅游套餐值得拥有。通过旅行社订票有时也可以享受较低的票价。
